title: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Mofa Xiaoxuesheng
title_japanese: 阿法贝乐园之魔法小学生
synopsis: There was an upsurge of learning magic in Alfabe Paradise. With the help of the magic giant Alfabe, everyone realized their wishes. Qiqi accidentally got the invisibility cloak she dreamed of, but lost her best friend E Zi; Xiaoya was timid and cowardly, but tried hard to prove that boiled eggs are the most delicious food in the gourmet contest. Qiqi got a free coupon for the Kingdom of Time to lead to the future. How would he choose? (translated from youku)

Prequel.name: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Mohuan Shikong

Sequel.name: A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Qi Jing Zhi Lu
